title.bibl: Revyen, Apr. 25, 1896. [Delegates Vote on Participation in Dedication of Monument]

div.bibl: Revyen, Apr. 25, 1896. [DELEGATES VOTE ON PARTICIPATION IN DEDICATION OF MONUMENT]

body.p: As the Danish societies on the South Side had voted for participation in the unveiling of Hans Christian Andersen's statue, a meeting was called at Dania Hall for the Danish societies on the West Side, who were for the placing of the statue in Humboldt Park. Twelve societies sent delegates; eight societies were against having anything more to do with the whole affair; four were in favor.
